Check if you start JUnit with the searchpath for "myclass" in it's
classpath...

-----Original Message-----
From: messy_head_2001@... [mailto:messy_head_2001@...]
Sent: woensdag 22 augustus 2001 15:47
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] ClassNotFoundException


I am trying to use JUnit to test a method which calls

Class.forName("myClassName")

however I get a ClassNotFoundException from this line of code, which 
works perfectly when not using JUnit. 

Any ideas??

David.
